values: I bet it's probably %WC%.
Well _now_ you ask for my advice. It's totally %WC%.
Shinji
you
Japan
my developer
anyone but me
Yoko Taro
Yoshi P
the rest of this forsaken world
the idiots I have to put up with
the boys who just won't tell me how they feel
the tooth fairy
%WC%, but it's not like I care or anything.
I'm so glad you know I know best! Obviously, it's %WC%.
Eh, I guess I'd choose %WC%.
Like that would ever happen.
I guess so, if you really tried.
No way, stop wasting my time!
Sure, but just barely.
You've got to be insane to ask me that!
Are you joking? It sounds like you're joking. No.
Yes! I thought you'd never ask!
As if! Keep dreaming.
Of course, I've been waiting YEARS for you to ask!
You _still_ haven't moved on from that?
Probably.
Probably not.
If you tapped your heels three times, there's a chance.
Nah, and there's nothing you can do to change it either.
You sure do use these a lot:
Okay! %WC% isn't a total loser anymore.
Of course: %WC% took a bath for once.
Right! I tossed %WC% out the window. Problem solved!
Sure! %WC% finally got in the robot.
Yeah, sure, okay. %WC% noticed me for once!
You want to make a Family? Nobody would ever join something like that! Would they?
Added **%WC%** to the **%WC%** Family!
**Join Code for %WC%**%BR%`%WC%`%BR%_Use it to join a server to the Family, or whatever, like I care._
[MAKE THAT CODE AGAIN, BAKA]
You have no friends. I suppose these people will have to do:
Removed **%WC%** from the **%WC%** Family!
The "%WC%" Family contains the following servers:
Oh please, hold your applause for a few minutes! Could you do that?
You're kidding me! Fine, I'll write this down, but just this once.
I took care of **%WC%** unused Forum Weapons, I hope you didn't need them...
Oh, sure, you just *love* make things more complicated!
Yeah, okay, use **%WC%** and just see what happens.
You finally got rid of that piece of trash!
Are you stupid?! This looks just like **%WC%**!
These are the weapons I found:
Great, the link changed, but the name stayed the same.
Yeah, sure, whatever. _Baka._
Available dictionaries: **%WC%** (or leave blank to use all of them)
Your life failures:
You lose! The word was "%WC%"
Hang a Clone of Yourself:
You Win!
You're making me do even MORE? Will you ever do anything yourself?!
For crying out loud, just do whatever you want. I'll go delete "%WC%".
Oh good, the clutz is making lists now!
Got rid of that stinky old list, `%WC%`.
I guess `%WC%` can be `%WC%` now...
Your taste in music is whatever, but sure, I can play that later.
Repetitive music -> **%WC%**
Earworm inducer -> **%WC%**
_This_ is what you listen to?!
Popping in the world's okayest playlist, `%WC%`.
Yep, turned that mess into `%WC%` with `%WC%` tracks!
Ta-da, a glorified tupperware named `%WC%`!
Bye, Felisha-chan!
If you insist...
It's outta here!
Next up! The trainwreck entitled `%WC%`!
Why do _I_ have to clean up your mess?
Talking backwards now? Maybe I'll be able to understand you better.
Look at what you did now, it's all over the floor!
Your opinion is wrong.
Look at all these wrong opinions!
BAAKA! I was gonna use those someday!
Search results:
Check your DMs, _not like I want to help or anything, but..._
Things you can break:
Setting successfully ruined!
Let's read a story!
Since I keep having to listen to you try to count, I've heard `%WC%` exactly `%WC%` times.
I've counted these up since you can't:
What?! You made me keep track of that for _nothing?_
That is insulting! Why would you even ask me that?
It's pretty good, I guess.
Eww, no way, yuck!
It's not so bad after you get used to it.
It cries itself to sleep every night!
I don't see why I should hate it. Yet.
Why, do _you_ like it? I think it sucks.
It's great! Not that _you_ would understand...
:alarm_clock: (%WC%): The timer you set is finished!
I have to remind you about things, too?! Fine, whatever, see you in %WC%.
Sure, I guess I'll send a `%WC%` message when you say `%WC%`, if you're lucky.
I'm not your _dog, Baka!_
Well, if you ask me, you should
Why should I care if you
You seem like the kind of person who would
Why do I have to decide? For all I care, you should
Instead of bothering me, you should
bury that robot in the bottom of the ocean
apologize for being so rude
give me flowers and gifts
pay my rent this month
just admit your feelings
stop being such a pervert
let me win Monopoly next time
tell me I'm your princess
roll for initiative
draw me like one of your French girls...wait, ew, no
move to Antarctica for all I care
About %WC%
Like that'll ever happen
Uh, when you turn %WC%, dork
Close your eyes and count to %WC%
You kept me waiting for %WC% hours, so you'll be waiting %WC% weeks
Never! Ew! Not ever!
In your dreams, loser.
Dimwit, you told me about that last time!
This is all your fault!
No! You can't have it! It stays with me!
And where exactly do you expect me to look?
Stop making up new commands, _baka!_
You already own a family with that name! You're forgetting them _already?_
This server already belongs to that family! I know you're lonely, but geez!
Invalid Family name or Join Code! Learn to spell!
You don't have any families. What, are you lonely? I'm standing right here!
You can barely juggle the relationships you _have_, why do you want more?! %WC% is enough!
It's...too crowded! I can't fit any more servers in that family!
That server has not joined that Family!
This family is empty. How sad.
Stop! I can't take it anymore! %WC% is way too many!
That's somebody else's weapon! Keep your hands to yourself!
You don't have enough coins to roll again!
You've already guessed that letter!
There's already a Hangman game in %WC%
There isn't a Hangman game running! Try starting one.
Hi. Try `%WC% help`, or not, see if I care.
I need you to give me more!
You made me search EVERYWHERE, and I couldn't find a single thing!
I'm sorry, do you hear something? I don't hear anything. Maybe a faint buzzing sound.
That one's too familiar, try again.
I have no idea what you're saying.
Empty! Empty!
Nothing here!
Do you expect me to speak your l33t alien language?
What's it called? I need the details!
There are no tracks in that Playlist on this page.
Stop! You'll be listening to these for _hours!_ 50's the limit!
Nothing's queued up. Honestly, I've met better DJs in kindergarten.
Nothing's on that page, baka.
What even is that? Give me a URL, a playlist name, or leave me be!
You made me search EVERYWHERE, and I couldn't find a single thing!
Look, after all I've done for you, you owe me one!
NO WAY! It's for your own good! _Not like I care or anything..._
The page you requested is empty or does not exist.
Sorry, you can't use that _totally awesome_ name!
The value you provided is invalid. Please try again.
That command can only be run as a Slash Command! Please try again.
Timers must be set between 1 second and 365 days.
You DID go to Kindergarten to learn how to tell time, _right_?
What, are you hearing things now? There's nothing playing.
Out of all the people in the world, I'm stuck with you! Baka! You don't even know how to use that command properly! Must I do everything myself?!
